channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump quiere que petroleras estadounidenses lleguen a Venezuela. Esto es lo que usted debe saber
item.description: El Presidente Donald Trump quiere que más compañías petroleras estadounidenses se incorporen a Venezuela. Pero existen razones económicas e históricas que podrían dificultar su acceso.
item.content:encoded:
El Presidente Donald Trump quiere que más compañías petroleras estadounidenses se incorporen a Venezuela. Pero existen razones económicas e históricas que podrían dificultar su acceso.

(Image credit: Matias Delacroix)
item.dc:creator: Julia Simon

item.title: Influencer, White House welfare fraud claims are distorted, but the system has risks
item.description: Federal officials are targeting Democratic-led states over alleged safety-net fraud. Critics worry a drumbeat of unfounded accusations could undermine public trust.
item.content:encoded:
Federal officials are targeting Democratic-led states over alleged safety-net fraud. Critics worry a drumbeat of unfounded accusations could undermine public trust.

(Image credit: Giovanna Dell'Orto)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Ludden

item.title: RFK Jr. cast doubt on a key vaccine. This country can't wait to get it
item.description: The U.S. is cutting the Hepatitis B vaccine from its recommended list. But here's a place where the medical establishment — and a rapper — are eager to obtain it.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. is cutting the Hepatitis B vaccine from its recommended list. But here's a place where the medical establishment — and a rapper — are eager to obtain it.

(Image credit: BSIP/Universal Images Group)
item.dc:creator: Michal Ruprecht

item.title: U.S. Figure Skating Championships will determine who's going to the Olympics
item.description: This week's competition in St. Louis will skaters tickets to the Milan-Cortina games in February
item.content:encoded:
This week's competition in St. Louis will skaters tickets to the Milan-Cortina games in February

(Image credit: Stephanie Scarbrough)
item.dc:creator: Lillian Karabaic

item.title: How the ICE shooting in Minneapolis and calls to deport Nicki Minaj are related
item.description: How are the calls to deport Nicki Minaj to Trinidad and the ICE shooting in Minneapolis related? They illustrate the contradictions that come up when people try to cherry pick applications of the law.
item.content:encoded: How are the calls to deport Nicki Minaj to Trinidad and the ICE shooting in Minneapolis related? They illustrate the contradictions that come up when people try to cherry pick applications of the law.
item.dc:creator: Leah Donnella

item.title: The CDC just sidelined these childhood vaccines. Here's what they prevent
item.description: The childhood vaccines that the CDC is dropping from the recommended scheduled have successfully beat back illness and death in children from rotavirus, hepatitis and other pathogens.
item.content:encoded:
The childhood vaccines that the CDC is dropping from the recommended scheduled have successfully beat back illness and death in children from rotavirus, hepatitis and other pathogens.

(Image credit: David Ryder)
item.dc:creator: Arthur Allen

item.title: Frictions over investigations emerge after ICE agent fatally shoots Minneapolis woman
item.description: Minnesota officials launch their own effort to collect evidence in the killing of Renee Good by an ICE agent. The move comes after shootings involving federal agents in Minneapolis and Portland, Ore.
item.content:encoded:
Minnesota officials launch their own effort to collect evidence in the killing of Renee Good by an ICE agent. The move comes after shootings involving federal agents in Minneapolis and Portland, Ore.

(Image credit: Kerem Yucel/MPR)
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: Southern Yemen separatist group says it will dissolve after its head fled to the UAE
item.description: Yemen's Southern Transitional Council and its institutions will be dismantled after weeks of unrest in southern areas and a day after its leader fled to the United Arab Emirates.
item.content:encoded:
Yemen's Southern Transitional Council and its institutions will be dismantled after weeks of unrest in southern areas and a day after its leader fled to the United Arab Emirates.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: National Park Service will void passes with stickers over Trump's face
item.description: The use of an image of Trump on the 2026 pass — rather than the usual picture of nature — has sparked a backlash, sticker protests, and a lawsuit from a conservation group.
item.content:encoded:
The use of an image of Trump on the 2026 pass — rather than the usual picture of nature — has sparked a backlash, sticker protests, and a lawsuit from a conservation group.

(Image credit: Department of Interior)
item.dc:creator: Windsor Johnston

item.title: Hiring slows in December to end the weakest year of job growth since the pandemic
item.description: U.S. employers added 50,000 jobs in December, according to a report from the Labor Department Friday. Measured annually, job gains in 2025 were the slowest since 2020.
item.content:encoded:
U.S. employers added 50,000 jobs in December, according to a report from the Labor Department Friday. Measured annually, job gains in 2025 were the slowest since 2020.

(Image credit: Spencer Platt)
item.dc:creator: Scott Horsley
